website_summaries.verdict: Skip this multicooker in favor of other countertop products that are less expensive and do the same tasks.
pros: The Black+Decker 6.5-Quart Multicooker performs a handful of tasks well, especially roasting and baking
cons: There's no timer built onto the machine, and the slow-cooking mode made some disappointing pot roast

customer_reviews.title: Cook in one pot , browns meat, sautés vegetables, and can make a lot of food in this cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I made my roux in this thing for chicken fricasse’ , I mean you can brown your meat sauté your onions, nothing it can’t do, love that I can just throw it all in there without having different pots for different steps , it’s easy. Liked it so much bought one for my son because he lives in his basement and is redoing it while renting the upstairs and only had a microwave so now he can cook eggs roast chicken etc. and he loves it as well and I just keep forwarding the recipes to him as like I say I cook everything in this cooker now.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It's a roaster and a slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It's a roaster and a slow cooker. You can brown meat, and then leave it to cook all day, all in one pot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Works great,...cooks well but doesn't brown your food well, though. It's a good product. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Gene P. Mccahill

customer_reviews.title: the best multi-cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is the best appliance. I can put a whole roaster chicken in it, sear it and cook it without using the slow cooker part. I love it. This is a wonderful addition to any kitchen. It is very versatile. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: the baker

customer_reviews.title: Not that great roasting a whole chicken Cambridge with a slight dent ...
customer_reviews.text: It's still at heart a slow cooker. You can Brown meat in it before slow cooking. Not that great roasting a whole chicken Cambridge with a slight dent on one side and a wrong knob that is just the opposite that it should be.
customer_reviews.author: jfscha

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooker!!! I love that the insert is not stoneware, it has a non stick but durable surface, and love the versatility, I use so much, it stays on my kitchen counter all the time.
customer_reviews.author: KHubbs

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have not cooked in it yet
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I picked this cooker was because I thought the cooking insert was ceramic. It is not. The base has a ceramic part.... not sure why, but the cook pot is metal with (hopefully) a nonstick surface. I had hoped to avoid that as so many of them peel and chip. Very disappointed. I have not cooked in it yet, but expect it will work as it is supposed to. Will update if it doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: I love this multi-function crock pot!
customer_reviews.text: Not only can you use this as an amazing conventional large crockpot, which can come apart with the lid and handles to a gathering, it can also sear and then roast your meat too! No longer will I have to use my oven for dinners in the hot summer, this crock pot is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dykhuis

customer_reviews.title: great for searing, the unit itself could be a bit sleeker
customer_reviews.text: i;ve been eyeing my friend's all clad slow cooker, but was willing to give this black and decker one a try. it performs wonderfully, the sear actually works unlike my west bend 6qt slow cooker. however, i found this unit to be a bit unweildy with how much the handles and knobs protrude. i wish it were just lower profile since it sits on my countertop
customer_reviews.author: engk916

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and well-designed slow-cooker
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad reviewing this in Summer, as it's (for us, anyway), clearly going to see most of its use in Winter. But Amazon Vine wants its review now, so here's what I can share -- It's good for soups, chili and oatmeal, and more than large enough for a family of five. We try to avoid teflon pans, and I'm glad that this unit has a ceramic cooking surface. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Neurasthenic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Most slow cookers do the job well enough. What makes this one stand out to me is how easy it is to clean. The pot is light and easy to maneuver. I also appreciate its shape. My previous slow cookers have been cylinders, this one allows me to view the food spread out across the book, making it easier to check its condition. Additionally, the lid fits well and is made of glass- some these days are plastic. I've used this for two meals so far- pot roast with potatoes and carrots, which came out slightly under-cooked, and BBQ chicken, which came out perfect. Overall this is a great product, and I hope to try the other cooking options soon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger N. Overton

customer_reviews.title: Like a regular crock pot only better
customer_reviews.text: I love crock pot meals. There's something about cooking with low heat for a long time that makes the food better. Perhaps it's the anticpiation as you smell the food for hours before you can eat it. By adding some more heat settings for this unit, you retain all of the good things about a crock pot and add the convenience of cooking faster if you want. In addition, this thing is very good sized so you can cook a ton of stuff in here. That also means that storage may be a consideration if you have a small kitchen or don't have much room in your kitchen thanks to other appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: a big slow cooker and not much else
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this cooker, particularly for the saute feature. So many slow cooker recipes call for browning meat prior to the slow cooking and I thought it would make very convenient work to be able to do this in one operation. I was very disappointed. Only the back right hand corner of the cooker got hot enough to saute. The others 3\4 of the pan was barely warm. I gave up on the browning and just turned on the allow cooking function. It works. If you already have a functioning slow cooker don't bother. This is too large and bulky to store based on that alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much more versatile than most
customer_reviews.text: We use crockpots / slow cookers often and this product is a really good one because it makes it easier for you to make more kinds of recipes without having to dirty a separate pot or pan to brown the meat. It also makes higher heat so that you can cook other things.
customer_reviews.author: EMTP EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but very easy to clean and has a lot of great cooking options.
customer_reviews.author: BookMonster

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER MC1100S Multi Cooker, 6.5 Quart, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Enhance your cooking prowess with the BLACK + DECKER Multicooker. Mealtime is made easy with true one-pot cooking capability that features high heat for browning meats and vegetables and traditional slow cooker functionality for roasts and soups. Variable temperature controls give you flexibility to cook from 200 Degree-450 DegreeF, and a warming function keeps food at perfect serving temperature. Plus, cleanup is quick and easy with removable ceramic parts and a tempered glass lid. Included Components: (1) Multicooker
feature_bullets: Variable Temperature: Sear and cook at high temperatures, then drop it down for slow cooking. Temperatures range from 200°-450°F.
Slow Cook Functionality: Two convenient settings allow you to keep foods at a safe temperature until serving.
Removable Cooking Pot: The removable cooking pot and tempered glass lid are dishwasher-safe to make cleanup quick and easy.
Steel Handles: Durable steel handles make the multicooker easily transportable. Includes silicon covered lid handle for added comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
